component.name: mpdevil
component.summary: A simple music browser for MPD

description.p: Mpdevil is a simple music browser for the Music Player Daemon (MPD) which is focused on playing local music without the need of managing playlists. Instead of maintaining a client side database of your music library mpdevil loads all tags and covers on demand. So you'll never see any outdated information in the browser. Mpdevil strongly relies on tags.

ul.li: Basic queue manipulation (move and delete single tracks)
